Summary: refulgent red & white lights ,moving like a fluttering butterfly
divs: Sighting DetailsI called my wife out to verify what i was seeing, she saw this: looking at the south sky at 9:45 pm I was looking at what I thought was a airplane flying south towards Arizona but then i realized it was not moving or flying south, then it jumped as if it was zigzaging backwards and circled the spot it was in but it was mostly like a fast fly fluttering butterfly or moth was red and white lights flicking off and on then it just zipped off with a white light trail but more like a white after trail, then I saw, (after my wife went into house to get bionoculars) i saw it level off again in south direction red and white pulsating back and forth(white light same color as star light)then red light out white light jumps leaving a trail then red light start flashing again but now has changed direction in north or up direction continuing on that course for roughly 40 seconds then again red light out white light jump with trailcrossing its former south courseor going down then i lost sight of it in haze or it just disappeared.but before i called for my wifes attention i saw the light for sevral minutes thinking it was nothing more than a star fluttering before it turned south with red white lights and zipped off south bound 1. looking up in the night sky. 2. i thought it was an airplane flying south bound. 3. an airplane 4. fluttering red & white pulsating lights 5. dumb foundedcuz i wasn't sure what i was watching but i know it was not and airplane !!! it zipped off south bound
